profile:
Hello, thank you for viewing my profile. I have worked in field of insurance restoration for approx 20 years. Providing services to insurance companies, restoration companies, and private homeowners. Since 2010 I have been specific to mould offering a wide range of services. 
- Free Visual Inspection
- Air Quality Testing
- Moisture meter
- Bulk samples, tape lifts, swabs
- Infra red, borescope 
- Laboratory analysis provided for all required sampling performed

Also we have the knowledge and experience to perform any type of mould remediation. Using only IICRC approved methods ensuring that your family is protected during all aspects of the remediation.
- Creation of Containment
- Installation of AFD's, Air Filtration Devices
- Installation of Air Movers and Dehumidifiers
- Proper IICRC approved methods for removal/disposal of affected materials
- Proper IICRC approved methods for cleaning of any salvaged contents and remaining building materials
- Approved applicators of Canadian made products to Eliminate Mould and associated staining, and to Keep Mould Gone! 
- Clearance Testing at Projects conclusion
- Ten Year Transferable  Warranty on All Work Performed
 
Thanks for taking the time time to view my profile please call 905-758-(MOLD)6653 to book a Free Visual Inspection
